entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kawartha Lakes (Lindsay)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 12:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -10.5°C
Wind: E 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Snow or ice pellets overnight. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Clearing in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
